title: The seconde [seventh] sermon of Maister Hughe Latimer which he preached before the Kynges Maiestie [with?]in his graces palayce at Westminster, ye xv. day of Marche [-xix daye of Apryll], M.ccccc.xlix.
author: Latimer, Hugh, 1485?-1555.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Jhon Day, dwellynge at Aldersgate, and Wylliam Seres, dwellyng in Peter Colledge ... to be solde at the new shop by the [sp--e?] Conduyte in Chepesyde,
